data.name: Karagon: Prelude
data.detailed_description:
WISHLIST THE FULL GAME

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1818610/Karagon/?snr=1_5_1100__1100

Join Discord


About the Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2084210/Alight_Lunar_Survival/

This is a free to play prelude for the full game Karagon!

Experience the start of Karagon in this free to play prelude!

The prelude includes an area of the full map and the first few progression tiers in the game. Most of the core features listed below are available in the prelude.

Survive, shoot, construct, and ride killer elemental robots.
Craft equipment, explore multi-floor buildings, build a base, uncover new schematics, and progress through technology tiers.
Alone or with friends in this post apocalyptic open world survival robot riding crafting shooter game!

  • Survive against robotic creatures using your crafted guns and constructed rideable robots! Dangerous robots will try to take you down with melee attacks and plasma lasers.
  • Craft guns, swords, tools, armor, workbenches and forges from technology you unlock and schematics you obtain! Gather natural resources and collect machine parts from fallen robot parts and destroyed robots.
  • Multi-floor buildings with killer robots with tons of unique loot and equipment schematics await. Explore houses, multi-floor highrises, tents, garages, bus stations, robot upgrade stations, portals, and more.

  • Explore & Progress through a post apocalyptic open world filled with discoveries and dangerous robots. Choose your path, progress through technology tiers, and gain the strength to face new exciting areas and robots.
  • Construct & Ride killer robots using gathered resources by weakening and scanning them in the wild. Shoot robots in the weakest spots to cause parts to fall off and deal a ton of damage, or ride your own robots and use them to attack!
  • Build your base to store and protect your items, machines, and robots. Alternatively you can also take over existing buildings.

  • Elemental robots and elemental guns & swords (Fire, Frost, Shock, Sharp) will be crucial to your journey, but will you be strong enough to obtain them?
  • Rare Exciting Occurrences await you in the world, from dark constructor storms to 4 unique rare variations of each robot (which you can scan and construct), you'll always be surprised by what you might find.
  • Singleplayer & Multiplayer: join a community server or get your friends to survive the robots and explore the world with you.
  • UE5 Lumen: experience cutting edge UE5 lumen global illumination and reflections technology: this means the graphics will look better than ever before in this next generation game!

WISHLIST THE FULL GAME

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1818610/Karagon/?snr=1_5_1100__1100
Discord Server

data.short_description: Survive, shoot, construct, and ride killer elemental robots. Craft equipment, explore multi-floor buildings, build a base, uncover new schematics, and progress through technology tiers. THIS IS A FREE DEMO for the post apocalyptic open world survival robot riding crafting shooter game Karagon!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 @ 3.3 GHz or AMD Ryzen 3 3300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3 GB or AMD Radeon RX 580 4 GB (estimate only)
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This is a demo for a next generation open world game, the default settings are for very high-end PCs. If you can't run the game well after lowering the settings and disabling UE5 Lumen, you DO NOT MEET THE REQUIREMENTS.
